text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg You are a bit behind the child is 4 not 3, and these 'conscientious' parents, both sick with Covid-19 drove 270miles with their child in their car, risking the child's health to visit parents who didn't have the virus to risk their health because they have no friends in London?
